title: Home Fires: Episode 2 Scene Masterpiece
text: In this scene from Home Fires, new arrival Theresa struggles to win the affections of a furry friend. Home Fires, Episode 2, airs Sunday, October 11, 2015 at 8/7c on MASTERPIECE on PBS. #HomeFiresPBS
